posts.body:
Basically the same rules as 8chan's /vr/, but with some minor tweaks to better fit the board's purpose.

All threads must pertain to console, computer, or arcade video games.

Allowed console games is anything that came out on a 5th gen console or older, or on the Dreamcast, Game Boy Advance, Wonderswan Color, or Pok√©mon Mini.

Allowed computer games is anything that came out in 2000 or earlier, or runs natively under Win98 or any other OS released before 2000.

Allowed arcade games is anything that was released in 2000 or before.

Related stuff like video game music and magazines are allowed. GCCX and any other professionally broadcasted TV shows about retro games is allowed.  E-Celebs are not allowed.

Discussion of NSFW games is allowed as long as it doesn't violate the previous rules.
